module.name: Ft.Xml.Lib.XmlString
module.description: Copyright 2005 Fourthought, Inc. (USA). Detailed license and copyright information: http://4suite.org/COPYRIGHT Project home, documentation, distributions: http://4suite.org/

function.name: IsNCName
function.description: Returns True if the given string matches the NCName production as defined by the W3C's Namespaces in XML Recommendation.

function.name: IsName
function.description: Returns True if the given string matches the Name production as defined by the W3C's XML 1.0 Recommendation.

function.name: IsNmtoken
function.description: Returns True if the given string matches the Nmtoken production as defined by the W3C's XML 1.0 Recommendation.

function.name: IsQName
function.description: Returns True if the given string matches the QName production as defined by the W3C's Namespaces in XML Recommendation.

function.name: IsXml
function.description: Return True if the given bytes represent a (possibly) well-formed XML document. (see http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#sec-guessing).

function.name: IsXmlSpace
function.description: Return True if there are only whitespace characters in S, False otherwise.

function.name: SplitQName
function.description: where 'qualifiedName' is a QName according to XML Namespaces 1.0 <http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names>. returns the name parts according to the spec.

function.name: XmlStrLStrip
function.description: Return a copy of the string S with leading whitespace removed.

function.name: XmlStrRStrip
function.description: Return a copy of the string S with trailing whitespace removed.

function.name: XmlStrStrip
function.description: Return a copy of the string S with leading and trailing whitespace removed.
